resources.description:

```json
  "message": "Token is required"
}
```

resources.name: Create Bot Field

resources.description:
### Parameters
#### Body
Depending on the type of Bot Field you will need to use one of the following type of data for "field_value".

For example:
Text: `“text”` (string)
Number: `123` or `1.23` (integer or float)
Boolean: `true` or `false` (boolean)
Date: `“2018-07-18”` (string)
Date and time: `“2018-07-02T00:00:00+00:00”` (string)

```
Data and time format for this API method is YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSP.  Where P is user’s timezone. For example May 1st 2018 06:30:24 UTC+3:00 should be formatted as 2018-05-01T06:30:24+03:00
```

```json
{
  "field_id": 0,
  "field_value": "'string', 123, true, '2018-07-18', '2018-07-02T00:00:00+00:00'"
}
```

### Response
#### 200
```json
{
  "status": "success"
}
```

#### 400
```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "string"
}
```
resources.name: Set Bot Field

resources.description:
### Parameters
#### Body
Depending on the type of Bot Field you will need to use one of the following type of data for "field_value".

For example:
Text: `“text”` (string)
Number: `123` or `1.23` (integer or float)
Boolean: `true` or `false` (boolean)
Date: `“2018-07-18”` (string)
Date and time: `“2018-07-02T00:00:00+00:00”` (string)

```
Data and time format for this API method is YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSP.  Where P is user’s timezone. For example May 1st 2018 06:30:24 UTC+3:00 should be formatted as 2018-05-01T06:30:24+03:00
```

```json
{
  "field_name": "string",
  "field_value": "'string', 123, true, '2018-07-18', '2018-07-02T00:00:00+00:00'"
}
```

### Response
#### 200
```json
{
  "status": "success"
}
```

#### 400
```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "string"
}
```

resources.description:
Send flow to subscriber

Supported message tags: `https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/send-messages/message-tags#supported_tags`

```json
{
  "subscriber_id": 0,
  "flow_ns": "string"
}
```

### Response
#### 200
```json
{
  "status": "success"
}
```

#### 400
```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "string"
}
```
resources.name: Send Flow

resources.description:
### Parameters
| Name              | Type      | Description                  |
|-------------------|-----------|------------------------------|
| subscriber_id     | integer   | The subscriber ID            |

### Response
#### 200
```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "string",
    "page_id": "string",
    "user_refs": "[{ 'user_ref':'-1543835812530302162', 'opted_in':'2018-12-03T11:17:54+00:00' }]",
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string",
    "name": "string",
    "gender": "string",
    "profile_pic": "string",
    "locale": "string",
    "language": "string",
    "timezone": "string",
    "live_chat_url": "string",
    "last_input_text": "string",
    "optin_phone": true,
    "phone": "string",
    "optin_email": true,
    "email": "string",
    "subscribed": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+02:00'",
    "last_interaction": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+02:00'",
    "last_seen": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+03:00'",
    "is_followup_enabled": "true",
    "custom_fields": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "string",
        "type": "text",
        "description": "string",
        "value": "'string', 123, true, '2018-07-18', '2018-07-02T07:45:00+03:00'"
      }
    ],
    "tags": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "string"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

resources.name: Find by Name

resources.description:
### Parameters
| Name              | Type      | Description                  |
|-------------------|-----------|------------------------------|
| user_re           | string    | The subscriber ref          |

### Response
#### 200
```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "string",
    "page_id": "string",
    "user_refs": "[{ 'user_ref':'-1543835812530302162', 'opted_in':'2018-12-03T11:17:54+00:00' }]",
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string",
    "name": "string",
    "gender": "string",
    "profile_pic": "string",
    "locale": "string",
    "language": "string",
    "timezone": "string",
    "live_chat_url": "string",
    "last_input_text": "string",
    "optin_phone": true,
    "phone": "string",
    "optin_email": true,
    "email": "string",
    "subscribed": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+02:00'",
    "last_interaction": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+02:00'",
    "last_seen": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+03:00'",
    "is_followup_enabled": "true",
    "custom_fields": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "string",
        "type": "text",
        "description": "string",
        "value": "'string', 123, true, '2018-07-18', '2018-07-02T07:45:00+03:00'"
      }
    ],
    "tags": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "string"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

#### 400
	
Possible error codes:
- 2011 - User_ref doesn’t registered
- 2012 - User_ref has not been linked with subscriber_id

```json
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "string",
  "error_code": 0
}
```
resources.name: Get Info by User Ref

resources.description:
This API method only works with Text and Number types of Custom User Fields.
Results are sorted by last Custom User Field value update for a specific user.
List is limited by 100 elements.

### Parameters
| Name              | Type      | Description                  |
|-------------------|-----------|------------------------------|
| field_id          | integer   |                              |
| field_value       | string    |                              |

### Response
#### 200
```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": "string",
    "page_id": "string",
    "user_refs": "[{ 'user_ref':'-1543835812530302162', 'opted_in':'2018-12-03T11:17:54+00:00' }]",
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string",
    "name": "string",
    "gender": "string",
    "profile_pic": "string",
    "locale": "string",
    "language": "string",
    "timezone": "string",
    "live_chat_url": "string",
    "last_input_text": "string",
    "optin_phone": true,
    "phone": "string",
    "optin_email": true,
    "email": "string",
    "subscribed": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+02:00'",
    "last_interaction": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+02:00'",
    "last_seen": "'2018-07-02T00:00:00+03:00'",
    "is_followup_enabled": "true",
    "custom_fields": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "string",
        "type": "text",
        "description": "string",
        "value": "'string', 123, true, '2018-07-18', '2018-07-02T07:45:00+03:00'"
      }
    ],
    "tags": [
      {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "string"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
